About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I am a diligent and results-driven individual who enjoys experiencing challenges. I am a person that is always seeking to acquire information that will enhance my knowledge to improve and gain experience in whatever I am being taught. I am looking for a job that will allow me to grow professionally and allow me to showcase my capabilities, strengths and utilize affectively the skills I have attained thus far as an aspiring Junior Web Developer.

HISTORY OF MY TECH PASSION

Technology has made my life easy, not knowing how some of the basic tech stuff was created has always fascinated me from a very young age. My passion though for coding started in primary school when I stumbled upon Inspect elements while I was messing around on my father’s computer. Since then I always wanted to learn about computer languages.
